extendedIngredients.name: cucumber
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 medium seeded and diced cucumber (do not peel, about 2 cups)

extendedIngredients.name: greek olives
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 cup Greek green olives, pitted and quartered

extendedIngredients.name: juice
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 tablespoons freshly squeezed juice from about 2 lemons

extendedIngredients.name: red onion
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/3 cup finely chopped red onion, from one red onion

extendedIngredients.name: tomatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 large tomatoes, seeded and diced (about 3 cups)

recipes.title: Chopped Greek Salad with Fresh Herbs

winePairing.pairingText: Chardonnay, Agiorgitiko, and Assyrtiko are my top picks for Greek Salad. Sauvignon Blanc and Gruner Veltliner both have herby notes that complement salads with enough acid to match tart vinaigrettes, while a Chardonnay can be a good pick for creamy salad dressings. The NV Mindbender Chardonnay with a 4.4 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 12 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Mindbender Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Lightly Oaked, the Mindbender Chardonnay is a sophisticated style of Chardonnay, that is full of the best elements of this classic grape varietal. The aromatics are complex and welcoming with floral and citrus tones mixed with hints of honeysuckle and butterscotch. The good percentage of oak aging brings a lovely vanilla note. The Mindbender Chardonnay is here to make you see Chardonnay in a new and innovative way. The Mindbender Chardonnay is a sophisticated style of Chardonnay, that is full of the best elements of this classic grape varietal. Visually it is golden straw in color. The aromatics are complex and welcoming with floral and citrus tones mixed with hints of honeysuckle and butterscotch. The well-rounded flavors carry the butterscotch throughout lending a smooth, creamy aspect while the citrus flavors bring freshness and brightness to the body. The good percentage of oak aging brings a lovely vanilla note. The finish is rounded out with a depth of ripe fruit flavors such as apricots, melons and peaches with a spritz of lime.

recipes.instructions: Procedures                                                                              1                                                                            Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl and toss well. Serve immediately.

steps.step: Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl and toss well.
